text: Hans Gerhard Creutzfeldt (June 2, 1885 â€“ December 30, 1964) was a German neuropathologist. He was the first to describe Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease. He was born in Harburg upon Elbe and died in Munich. Category:1885 births Category:1964 deaths Category:German doctors Category:German neurologists
